text: @FoxNews Coronavirus Infection and death count: 600,000 infected and 25,000 deaths. Real numbers are probably higher as there were deaths in January and February that weren’t accounted for. We know Potus Trump had better things to do in Jan/Feb: Rallies & Golfing! No action for 70 days!
